<item>
      <title>Are You a Bad Parent If You Rely On Parenting Tech?</title>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">SB12701433245060414032904584041340313998968</guid>
      <link>https://www.wsj.com/articles/parenting-tech-is-relying-on-it-cheating-1518802700?mod=WSJ_GoogleNews</link>
      <description>Anxious to raise their kids the ‘natural’ way, many parents shun innovative gadgets that might make life easier. But some tech can be your ally, argues one new mom.</description>

      <media:content xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss"
               url="http://s.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-XM292_COVER_G_20180214155852.jpg"
